citations.narrative:
Inside the goat enclosure, the watering receptacle in this enclosure has an excess of green material covering the
inside of the watering receptacle. Dirty water may harbor disease hazards which may pose a health risk for the
animals. All water receptacles shall be kept clean and sanitary.
Correct from this day forward.
Inspection and exit interview conducted by APHIS personnel with licensee.

narrative:
3.130
WATERING.  
Inside the goat enclosure, the watering receptacle in this enclosure has an excess of green material covering the
inside of the watering receptacle.  Dirty water may harbor disease hazards which may pose a health risk for the
animals.  All water receptacles shall be kept clean and sanitary.
Correct from this day forward.
Inspection and exit interview conducted by APHIS personnel with licensee.
